weeklySchedule.warmup: 5-10 min light cardio (e.g., treadmill or stationary bike) + dynamic stretches (arm circles, leg swings, torso twists)
weeklySchedule.cooldown: 5-10 min static stretching (focus on chest, shoulders, and triceps)

weeklySchedule.warmup: 5-10 min light cardio (e.g., rowing machine or brisk walk) + dynamic stretches (hip circles, lunges, arm swings)
weeklySchedule.cooldown: 5-10 min static stretching (focus on hamstrings, quads, and core)

activeRecoveryNote: On rest days, try light yoga or a 20-30 min walk to promote recovery and flexibility.
personalNote: Health Warning: Since you're on Metoprolol (a beta blocker), monitor your heart rate during workouts and avoid sudden intensity spikes. Start with lighter weights and gradually progress. Stay hydrated and listen to your body. Motivational Tip: Consistency is key! Even small gains add up over time.
